subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: For the first time in his 22-year N.F.L. coaching career, Mike Westhoff, the Jets’ animated special teams coach, will call plays from the press box.
snippet: For the first time in his 22-year N.F.L. coaching career, Mike Westhoff, the Jets’ animated special teams coach, will call plays from the press box.
